info.title: Gandalf API
info.description:
`Gandalf` is a **Open-Source** Decision Engine for Big-Data. 

You can find source code on our [GitHub account](https://github.com/Nebo15/gandalf.api/). Itâ€™s build on top of PHP Lumen framework and MongoDB.

get.description: Get list of users with pagging and live search

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Parameter searching users by usernames. If name == jo, in the response users will be with usernames which starts on jo, Jo, JO

post.description:
Get user access token, grant_type password scenario
**Every request should be with Access Token**
**-H 'Authorization: token_type access_token_here'**

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: User password, required if grant_type == password

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Refresh token, required if grant_type == refresh_token

post.description:
Can create project and in the feature link tables to it.
When you created project, your feature requests should be with Header
**-H 'X-Application: project_id'**

get.description: Get list of projects for current user

post.description:
Every into existing project user can create consumer with own scopes.
For login as consumer you should make Basic Auth client_id:client_secret

put.description: Update description or scopes of consumer, by client_id

delete.description: Remove consumer from the project by client_id

post.description: Adding existing user to the current project. Share project with other users with different scopes

delete.description: Adding existing user to the current project. Share project with other users with different scopes

default_decision.description: If there are no rows with all validations passed, this decision will be set for Decision.

default_title.description: If there are no rows with all validations passed, this title will be set for Decision.

default_description.description: If there are no rows with all validations passed, this description will be set for Decision.

post.description: Create new Table from existing Table by id

get.description: Get Table analytics by all made Decisions

200.description: Table object with matched probabilities and requests amount for each condition

get.description: Get list of all Changelog Tables

parameters.name: compare_with
parameters.description: Changelog ID. View changes relative from current (if not passed `original` parameter) Table state to passed Table state

parameters.name: original
parameters.description: Changelog ID. Set Table state, that will be compared with `compare_with` Table state

get.description: Rollback Table to some state that described in passed Changelog

_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific Table. MongoID

author.description: Author of changes of the current model.

attributes.description: All Table attributes, with Embed IDs

preset.description: Preset object. You can modify field value for table rows by adding field preset.

value.description: Value type can be different depends on condition

than.description: Decision, when this rule is matched

value.description: Value type can be different depends on condition

than.description: Decision, when this rule is matched

conditions.description: Array of Condition objects with analytics data

value.description: Value type can be different depends on condition

probability.description: Probability value between 0-1, where 1 is 100% matched result

_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific Table. MongoID

title.description: Title of the matched rule or Table.default_title.

description.description: Description of the matched rule or Table.default_description.

title.description: Matched Rule.title if no one rules is matched Table.default_title.

description.description: Matched Rule.description or if no one rules is matched - Table.default_description.

matching_type.description: Matched_type rule. The same as in Table.matching_type.

group.description: Short Group object. May be null if decision was made not from Group

final_decision.description: Depends of the Table.matching_type could be as highest row in a table with all validations passed or sum of scoring points

than.description: Decision, when this rule is matched

decision.description: Current decision for this rule. If not matched - null

_id.description: Unique identifier representing a specific Table. MongoID

description.description: Description of the matched rule or Table.default_description.

refresh_token.description: Unique refresh token linked to current access token for current user
